name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.retry-delay.max.ms
description:
The maximum number of ms the reducer will delay before retrying
  to download map data.

name: dfs.client.block.reader.remote.buffer.size
description:
The output stream buffer size of a DFSClient remote read. The buffer default value is 512B. The buffer includes
      only some request parameters that are: block, blockToken, clientName, startOffset, len, verifyChecksum,
      cachingStrategy.

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.namenode-retries
description: Number of retries to use when contacting the namenode when tailing the log.

name: dfs.namenode.max.slowpeer.collect.nodes
description:
How many slow nodes we will collect for filtering out
    when choosing targets for blocks.

    It is ignored if dfs.namenode.block-placement-policy.exclude-slow-nodes.enabled is false.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client.max-retries
description:
The number of client retries to the RM/HS before
    throwing exception. This is a layer above the ipc.

name: dfs.client.failover.max.attempts
description:
Expert only. The number of client failover attempts that should be
    made before the failover is considered failed.

name: ipc.client.connect.max.retries.on.timeouts
description:
Indicates the number of retries a client will make on socket timeout
               to establish a server connection.
